code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'../styles/Contact.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Contact=()=>{const[isSubmitting,setIsSubmitting]=useState(false);const[submitStatus,setSubmitStatus]=useState(null);const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setIsSubmitting(true);setSubmitStatus(null);const form=e.target;const data=new FormData(form);try{const response=await fetch('https://formspree.io/shivanichow2001@gmail.com',{method:'POST',body:data,headers:{Accept:'application/json'}});if(response.ok){setSubmitStatus('success');form.reset();}else{setSubmitStatus('error');}}catch{setSubmitStatus('error');}finally{setIsSubmitting(false);setTimeout(()=>setSubmitStatus(null),5000);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"contact",id:"contact",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section-title",children:"Contact"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"contact-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"contact-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"shivanichow2001@gmail.com"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Phone"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"+1 (518) 870 7785"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Availability"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Open to full-time opportunities"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"contact-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Get in Touch"}),submitStatus==='success'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"alert alert-success",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Success!"})," Your message has been sent.
